description.value: This codesystem captures the indicator codes defined by the CDS Hooks specification. The indicator is included as an element of the cards in a CDS Hooks response and conveys the urgency and/or importance of the information in each card. See [Card Attributes](https://cds-hooks.hl7.org/1.0/#card-attributes) in the CDS Hooks specification for more information. Note - the CodeSystem is transitioning from the Vocabulary Work Group to Clinical Decision Support (CDS) Work Group.

definition.value: The response is informational and indicates that it contains additional information or relevant guidance that may be of interest
The response is a warning and indicates that it contains urgent or highly relevant information that should be considered
The response is critical and indicates that it contains information or activities that have high urgency and importance that should be immediately addressed
